cells.content:
**Notes**

* Commands: SADD, SMEMBERS
* SET always has unique members.

SADD FirstSet mem1
SADD FirstSet mem2
SMEMBERS FirstSet 

SADD COLORS1 red blue green
SADD COLORS2 red gray brown
SADD COLORS3 gray purple red

SUNION COLORS1 COLORS2 COLORS3
SINTER COLORS1 COLORS2 COLORS3 
SDIFF COLORS1 COLORS2 COLORS3
SDIFF COLORS2 COLORS1 COLORS3
SDIFF COLORS3 COLORS1 COLORS2
SDIFF COLORS1 COLORS2
SDIFF COLORS2 COLORS3
SDIFF COLORS1 COLORS3
// Restricted in cloud
// SINTERCARD 3 COLORS1 COLORS2 COLORS3 LIMIT 5
SRANDMEMBER COLORS1 
SMOVE COLORS1 COLORS2 green 
SPOP COLORS2
SMEMBERS COLORS1  
SMEMBERS COLORS2  
DEL FirstSet COLORS1 COLORS2 COLORS3

SADD COLORS1 red blue green
SADD COLORS2 red gray brown
SADD COLORS3 gray purple red
SINTERSTORE SetInter COLORS1 COLORS2
SUNIONSTORE SetUnion COLORS1 COLORS2
SDIFFSTORE SetDiff COLORS1 COLORS2

SMEMBERS SetInter 
SMEMBERS SetUnion 
SMEMBERS SetDiff 

DEL SetInter SetUnion SetDiff COLORS1 COLORS2 COLORS3

SADD CR7 TheBest TheGOAT TheLegend UCL WC
// Check if item is a member of the key
SISMEMBER CR7 name
SISMEMBER CR7 TheBest 
// Check multiple members
SMISMEMBER CR7 TheGoat WorldCup UCL

// Checking cardinality
SCARD CR7
SREM CR7 WC
SMEMBERS CR7

DEL CR7
